title: User Registration with Email and Password
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with valid email and password, and receive confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to the signup page
Enter a valid email address and a strong password
Submit the registration form
Confirm that registration is successful and user is redirected to a welcome or profile page
Validate that confirmation email is sent if applicable

title: User Login via Email and Password
description: Verify that registered users can login using their email and password credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid email and password
Click the login button
Ensure login is successful and user is navigated to dashboard or homepage

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify that login attempt with invalid email or password results in proper error message.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input invalid email or incorrect password
Click the login button
Verify that an error message is displayed and login is prevented

title: User Login via Google OAuth
description: Verify login flow using Google OAuth provider succeeds and user is authenticated.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Click 'Sign in with Google' button
Complete Google OAuth consent and authentication
Confirm user is logged in and redirected to dashboard or homepage

title: Create Product Listing with Valid Details and Images
description: Verify that logged-in user can create a detailed product listing with proper category, type (Offer/Demand), and image uploads.

steps.description: Login as a valid user
Navigate to new product listing creation page
Fill in all mandatory fields with valid data
Select category and listing type (Offer/Demand)
Upload product images complying with size and type restrictions
Submit the product listing form
Verify that the product listing is created successfully and a success notification is shown

title: Validation Error on Incomplete Product Listing Submission
description: Verify that submitting a new product listing with missing required fields triggers validation errors.

steps.description: Login as a valid user
Navigate to new product listing creation page
Leave one or more required fields blank
Attempt to submit the form
Confirm error messages are displayed corresponding to missing required fields

title: Reject Product Listing with Invalid Image Uploads
description: Verify that product image uploads exceeding size limit or unsupported file types are rejected with clear feedback.

steps.description: Navigate to product listing creation page as logged-in user
Attempt to upload images exceeding the maximum allowed size or in unsupported formats
Verify user receives specific error messages about image upload restrictions

title: Edit Product Listing Successfully
description: Verify that users can edit their product listings and changes persist after update.

steps.description: Login as a valid user with existing listings
Navigate to the user's product listings page
Select a listing and open edit form
Modify fields such as price, description, or category
Submit the changes
Verify that the listing is updated with new information and success notification is displayed

title: Deactivate and Reactivate Product Listing
description: Verify that users can toggle activation status of their product listings and the status reflects correctly.

steps.description: Login as user with active product listings
Navigate to user's listings
Deactivate an active listing
Ensure listing is marked as inactive and no longer appears in active searches
Reactivate the same listing
Ensure listing status is active and visible in searches again

title: Delete Product Listing with Confirmation
description: Verify that deleting a product listing requires user confirmation and the listing is removed.

steps.description: Login as user with at least one product listing
Navigate to user's product listings page
Initiate deletion of a listing
Verify confirmation dialog appears
Confirm deletion
Check that the listing is removed and success notification is shown

title: Browse Products with Category Filter and Search
description: Verify visitors and logged-in users can filter product listings by categories and search terms.

steps.description: Navigate to products page
Select a product category filter
Validate that only products belonging to selected category are displayed
Input a keyword into the product search box
Confirm products matching the search term are successfully filtered and displayed

title: View Product Details with Images and Seller Contact
description: Verify the product detail page shows all relevant information including images and seller contact details.

steps.description: Select a product from the listing
Verify product images, name, description, category, and price are displayed
Check that seller contact information is visible and correctly formatted

title: Initiate and Send Message with Attachment in Direct Messaging
description: Verify that logged-in users can create new conversations, send messages with file attachments successfully.

steps.description: Login as a valid user
Navigate to messaging page
Start a new conversation with another user
Type a message and attach valid file
Send the message
Verify message and attachment appear correctly and recipient can view them

title: Close a Chat Conversation with Confirmation
description: Verify user can close a conversation with confirmation dialog and the chat status updates accordingly.

steps.description: Open an active conversation
Click on close chat option
Confirm confirmation dialog is displayed
Confirm chat closure
Check that conversation is marked closed and disallow further messages

title: Add New Service and Attach Images
description: Verify that logged-in users can create new service listings with valid details and images upload.

steps.description: Login as a user
Navigate to add new service page
Fill in service details and upload service images
Submit the new service listing
Verify the service is added successfully and listed

title: Submit and Display Service Reviews with Ratings
description: Verify users can submit reviews and ratings for services and reviews are displayed correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to a service detail page
Submit a review with rating and comment
Verify the review and rating are saved and appear under the service reviews section

title: Filter and Search Services
description: Verify that users can filter and search services accurately by name or category.

steps.description: Navigate to the services listing page
Apply filters or search for specific service names
Confirm the displayed services match filter and search criteria

title: Edit User Profile and Verify Changes Persist
description: Verify users can update their personal information, reputation, and verification status is displayed correctly.

steps.description: Login and open the user profile page
Edit fields such as name, contact info, or profile picture
Save the changes
Verify updates persist and are reflected on profile and related components

title: Notification Center: Mark as Read, Filter, and Delete
description: Verify that users can view notifications, mark them as read/unread, apply filters, and delete notifications.

steps.description: Login and navigate to notification center
Mark selected notifications as read
Ensure read notifications display updated status
Apply filters to show only unread/read notifications
Ensure filtered view matches the filter selection
Delete a notification
Verify notification is removed from the list

title: Verify Product View Count Increment with Spam Protection
description: Ensure product view count increments once per user per hour and repeated views are blocked by localStorage mechanisms.

steps.description: Open a product detail page as a visitor or logged-in user
Check that product view count increments by 1
Reload or revisit the same product within 1 hour
Verify that view count does not increment again

title: Security: Input Sanitization Prevents XSS Attacks
description: Verify that all user inputs are sanitized on client and server sides to prevent XSS injection.

steps.description: Attempt to submit inputs containing malicious scripts in product listing, profile edits, messages, and reviews
Verify that input sanitization strips or encodes malicious inputs, preventing script execution

title: Authorization Checks Prevent Unauthorized Actions
description: Verify that critical API endpoints enforce authorization properly preventing unauthorized access or modification.

steps.description: Attempt to perform product/service listing edits or deletes from another user's credentials or unauthenticated state
Confirm request is denied with proper error code and no data is altered

title: Secure File Uploads Validate Types and Sizes
description: Verify all file uploads validate file type and size limits on both client and server sides.

steps.description: Attempt to upload allowed and disallowed file types and oversized files during product and service creation or messaging
Verify disallowed uploads are rejected with appropriate error messages and allowed uploads proceed successfully

title: Middleware Enforces HTTPS and Secure Headers
description: Verify the platform middleware actively redirects HTTP requests to HTTPS and adds security headers correctly.

steps.description: Send HTTP request to the platform
Confirm automatic redirect to HTTPS
Inspect response headers for security headers (e.g., Content-Security-Policy, X-Frame-Options)
Verify presence and correctness of security headers

title: Responsive Sidebar Navigation Adapts to User State and Screen Size
description: Verify sidebar navigation adjusts correctly for logged in/out users and across mobile, tablet, and desktop breakpoints.

steps.description: Test navigation as logged-out visitor on desktop viewport
Verify appropriate nav links are shown for guest users and layout matches desktop design
Login and check sidebar links on desktop size
Verify logged-in user links are shown and layout is correct
Resize viewport to tablet and mobile widths and verify sidebar responsiveness and toggle functionality
Ensure the navigation adjusts appropriately, remains usable and does not break

title: Error Handling Displays Custom Pages and Messages
description: Verify the application displays custom error pages and user-friendly messages on not found routes and when errors occur.

steps.description: Navigate to a non-existent route
Confirm that the custom 404 'not found' page is displayed
Trigger server error or client error in API or page
Verify custom error page or error message is displayed gracefully

title: UI Components Display Loading and Confirmation States Correctly
description: Verify UI components such as loading spinners, toasts, and confirmation dialogs operate correctly during asynchronous operations.

steps.description: Trigger data fetches that have loading states (e.g., product list, profile update)
Observe UI displays loading indicators appropriately
Perform deletions or state toggling to observe confirmation dialogs
Confirm that confirmation dialogs appear and respond correctly to user actions

title: Main Landing Page Displays Correct Sections
description: Verify the homepage shows hero section, featured products, call-to-action, and platform statistics as designed.

steps.description: Navigate to the main landing page
Ensure hero section is visible with correct content
Verify featured products are displayed and can be interacted with
Check visibility and accuracy of platform statistics
Confirm call-to-action buttons are present and functional
